forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun gleams through a tapestry of azure skies, casting a pleasant warmth that beckons residents and visitors alike. With temperatures gently oscillating around a mild 67 degrees, the breeze whispers through the streets at 17 mph, punctuated occasionally by gusts that hint at the excitement of a brisk coastal day. The clarity is remarkable, embracing the skyline while the iconic silhouette of the Golden Gate Bridge stands proudly against the backdrop, unhindered by fog or haze.

As evening approaches, the sky will transition to a soft, mostly cloudy hue, with temperatures settling comfortably at around 57 degrees. A lighter wind will continue to caress the city, urging you to wear a light jacket as the night unfolds. Given the delightful conditions, it is the perfect time to embark on a leisurely stroll through the nearby parks, perhaps stopping at an outdoor café to savor a warm drink while watching the city light up as dusk settles. Embrace the inviting nature of the day, and take advantage of this harmonious blend of sun and breeze before the clouds gently embrace the night.
